mapper.update:
UPDATE blog_article
content = #{content},
title = #{title},
isPrivate = #{isPrivate},
pubDate = #{pubDate},
summary = #{summary},
art_level = #{level}, art_lock = #{lockId},
art_status = #{status,javaType=ArticleStatus,typeHandler=EnumOrdinalTypeHandler},
art_from = #{from,javaType=ArticleFrom,typeHandler=EnumOrdinalTypeHandler},
space_id = #{space.id},
allowComment = #{commentConfig.allowComment},
comment_mode = #{commentConfig.commentMode,javaType=CommentMode,typeHandler=EnumOrdinalTypeHandler},
comment_asc = #{commentConfig.asc},
comment_allowHtml = #{commentConfig.allowHtml},
comment_limitCount = #{commentConfig.limitCount},
comment_limitSec = #{commentConfig.limitSec},
lastModifyDate = #{lastModifyDate}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT art.id AS art_id, art.pubDate, art.lastModifyDate, art.title, art.isPrivate, art.hits, art.comments, art.summary, art.art_level, art.art_status, art.art_from, art.space_id, art.art_lock, sp.space_alias, space_lock, sp.is_private AS space_is_private, GROUP_CONCAT(bt.tag_name) AS tags FROM blog_article art LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_space sp ON art.space_id = sp.id LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_article_tag bat ON bat.article_id = art.id LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_tag bt ON bat.tag_id = bt.id WHERE art.id IN #{id} GROUP BY art.id ORDER BY FIELD(art.id, #{id} )

SELECT pubDate,COUNT(art.id) AS art_count,art.id FROM blog_article art LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_space sp ON art.space_id = sp.id WHERE art_status = 0
AND art.isPrivate = false AND sp.is_private = false
AND space_id = #{space.id}
GROUP BY YEAR(pubDate)
GROUP BY YEAR(pubDate),MONTH(pubDate)
GROUP BY YEAR(pubDate),MONTH(pubDate),DATE(pubDate)

SELECT space_id,space_alias,space_name,COUNT(art.id) AS art_count,art.id AS art_id FROM blog_article art LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_space sp ON art.space_id = sp.id WHERE art_status = 0
AND art.isPrivate = false AND sp.is_private = false
GROUP BY space_id
WHERE art.art_status = 1 AND art.pubDate <= #{date} GROUP BY art.id
mapper.update: UPDATE blog_article SET hits = hits + #{hits} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE blog_article SET comments = comments + #{comments} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT art.id AS art_id, art.content, art.pubDate, art.lastModifyDate, art.title, art.isPrivate, art.hits, art.comments, art.summary, art.art_level, art.art_status, art.art_from, art.editor, art.space_id, art.art_lock, art.allowComment, art.comment_mode, art.comment_asc, art.comment_allowHtml, art.comment_limitCount, art.comment_limitSec, sp.space_alias, sp.space_name, space_lock, sp.is_private AS space_is_private, GROUP_CONCAT(bt.tag_name) AS tags FROM blog_article art LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_space sp ON art.space_id = sp.id LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_article_tag bat ON bat.article_id = art.id LEFT OUTER JOIN blog_tag bt ON bat.tag_id = bt.id
